authorities_info.name: Human Design Authorities
authorities_info.description: The 7 types of inner authority for decision-making in Human Design
authorities_info.purpose: Inner authority determines how each person is designed to make correct decisions
authorities_info.source: Human Design System by Ra Uru Hu

Sacral_Authority.name: Sacral Authority
Sacral_Authority.requirement: Sacral Center defined, Solar Plexus undefined
Sacral_Authority.description: The most common authority, based on gut responses and life force energy. Decisions are made through immediate sacral sounds and gut feelings.

how_it_works.timing: Immediate response, don't think about it

decision_process: Ask yes/no questions
Listen for immediate gut response
Trust the sound/feeling, not the mind
Don't overthink or rationalize
tips: Have others ask you yes/no questions
Notice your energy levels after decisions
examples: Should I take this job? (Uh-huh = yes)
Do I want to go to this event? (Unh-uh = no)
Is this the right relationship? (Hmm = unclear, ask differently)

Emotional_Authority.name: Emotional Authority
Emotional_Authority.description: Decision-making through emotional clarity over time. No truth in the now - must wait for emotional wave to complete before deciding.

how_it_works.mechanism: Emotional wave from high to low
how_it_works.timing: Wait for clarity, no rush decisions

decision_process: Feel the initial emotional response
Wait for the wave to move through
Check decision at different emotional points
Decide when feeling neutral/clear
common_mistakes: Believing there's truth in the now

Splenic_Authority.name: Splenic Authority
Splenic_Authority.requirement: Spleen defined, Solar Plexus and Sacral undefined
Splenic_Authority.description: Intuitive authority based on survival instincts and in-the-moment awareness. Decisions come as quiet inner knowing.
decision_process: Tune into subtle body awareness
Listen for quiet inner voice
Trust first instinct
Act on intuitive knowing immediately
examples: Sudden knowing to leave a situation

Heart_Authority.name: Heart Authority (Ego Authority)
Heart_Authority.requirement: Heart Center defined, Solar Plexus, Sacral, and Spleen undefined
Heart_Authority.description: Willpower-based authority focused on what the heart truly wants and values. Decisions based on personal desires and self-worth.

how_it_works.question: What do I want? What's in it for me?

decision_process: Ask 'What do I want?'
Consider what's truly important to you
Check if it aligns with your values
Decide based on heart's desire
examples: Choosing career based on personal values
Deciding relationships based on what you want

G_Center_Authority.name: G-Center Authority (Self-Projected Authority)
G_Center_Authority.requirement: G-Center connected to Throat, other motor centers undefined
G_Center_Authority.description: Identity and direction-based authority. Decisions come through speaking and hearing your own voice about identity and direction.

how_it_works.process: Hear yourself talk about the decision

decision_process: Talk about the decision with others
Listen to what you hear yourself saying
Notice what feels true when spoken
Decide based on what sounds right
common_mistakes: Ignoring what you hear yourself say
tips: Find trusted people to talk with
Pay attention to your own words
Notice what feels true when spoken

Mental_Authority.name: Mental Authority (Environmental Authority)
Mental_Authority.requirement: Ajna connected to Throat, no motor centers defined
Mental_Authority.description: Mental processing authority that requires talking through decisions with others. Clarity comes through mental exchange and discussion.
decision_process: Find trusted advisors to discuss with
Talk through all aspects of decision
Process mentally with different people
Decide after thorough mental exploration

Lunar_Authority.name: Lunar Authority
Lunar_Authority.description: Decision-making over a full lunar cycle (28+ days). Reflectors sample different energies and perspectives before making major decisions.
decision_process: Begin considering decision at new moon
Sample different environments and people
Notice how decision feels in different contexts
Decide after full lunar cycle completion

lunar_phases.new_moon: Plant the seed of the decision

examples: Major life moves over lunar cycle
